replies.msg:
photon 主要兩條

KEmax=eVs

Vs 叫stopping potential
如果題目話Vs=2.4V
即係KEmax 就會係2.4eV(能量單位）
而個KEmax 係incoming photon 比既，
photon 會成粒比電子食， 食完扣左workfuntion φ 就轉化成KEmax

個關係係KEmax=hf-φ
可以諗成：
災民收到既$=善長比既$-行政費$

e.g. 如果題目話KEmax 係2.4eV, φ係3eV
咁既話incoming photon 能量就係2.4+3=5.4eV

但留意photon 既能量，E=hf 個hf 既單位係J
所以如果想搵番今次photn 既f, 要將5.4eV 轉番做J

要先記得個轉換一係×一係÷ 1.6x10^-19
(即係好似JPY轉HKD個關係係,x 定÷呢？諗番1JPY=0.07HKD 同埋1eV=1.6x10^-19J, eV同JPY一樣都係面值細）
所以有5.4eV 想轉J 個理解係同 5.4JPY 轉HKD 係一樣，即係乖）

quote.msg:
photon 主要兩條

KEmax=eVs

Vs 叫stopping potential
如果題目話Vs=2.4V
即係KEmax 就會係2.4eV(能量單位）
而個KEmax 係incoming photon 比既，
photon 會成粒比電子食， 食完扣左workfuntion φ 就轉化成KEmax

個關係係KEmax=hf-φ
可以諗成：
災民收到既$=善長比既$-行政費$

e.g. 如果題目話KEmax 係2.4eV, φ係3eV
咁既話incoming photon 能量就係2.4+3=5.4eV

但留意photon 既能量，E=hf 個hf 既單位係J
所以如果想搵番今次photn 既f, 要將5.4eV 轉番做J

要先記得個轉換一係×一係÷ 1.6x10^-19
(即係好似JPY轉HKD個關係係,x 定÷呢？諗番1JPY=0.07HKD 同埋1eV=1.6x10^-19J, eV同JPY一樣都係面值細）
所以有5.4eV 想轉J 個理解係同 5.4JPY 轉HKD 係一樣，即係乖）

而 KEmax=hf-φ
個concept 同 internal reaistance
V=ε-Ir

所以明果個應該會明哩個，

replies.msg:
step1:
a. 好似真係做實驗咁，將啲唔關事嘅線搬開廢時亂先(紅色路線）
b. 除左題目要求嘅AY無視其他點

step2(最難呢步）: 同顏色頭尾駁住嘅就係parallel
呢條題目resistor 1,2都係俾藍+綠色包住，所以1,2係parallel，變做一舊6ohm嘅resistor。剩低個啲唔好郁佢

呢條題目好在，攪左一次resistor1同2其他唔駛點執，都已經見到係A伸出三條parallel嘅路

replies.msg:
係DSE, 你知道speed depends on medium, frequency depends on source, 而wavelength 係speed 同frequency ratio 就得。

而色散，depresion of light, 唔同色嘅光有唔同speed,所以有唔同angle of refraction。

而Dispersion 係大學level 嘅解釋係因為phase velocity depends on frequency，或者簡化咁講，個refractive index depends on wavelength。

quote.msg: 我就係撞到呢類型就唔識做 有冇人解釋下點揾個direction?

replies.msg:
1. Lenz law - Lenz's law states that when an emf is generated by a change in magnetic flux according to Faraday's Law, the polarity of the induced emf is such, that it produces an current that's magnetic field opposes the change which produces it

2. EMF formula emf= -(N delta(phi)) / delta t
N= number of coil in a wire,
delta(phi) = change in external magnetic flux
delta t = change in time.

3. Inducted Magnetic flux = delta(phi) induced

therefore
(i) the rectangular loop move toward right, which experiences increase in external magnetic flux that is coming out of the page, so by the emf formula in 2. the induced magnetic flux is going to oppose the increase in external magnetic field. Hence applying the right hand rule to rectangular loop wire closest to the straight wire, the induced current in the rectangular loop will give rise to the induced magnetic flux that opposes the increase of the magnetic flux. So since the straight wire magnetic flux is out of the page, then induced magnetic flux is to oppose which is going into the page. taking the right side of the rectangular loop for right hand rule, the induced current is flowing from top to bottom to create the magnetic flux flowing into the page, so from the current flow direction at the right side from top to bottom, we can deduced that the current flow in the rectangular loop is counter clockwise.


The key to understand is this:

Relation between External Magnetic Field (flux) is always Opposite with the Induced Magnetic Field so as to achieve equilibrium.

Once you developed the this idea, apply it to the question. if you have a change in magnetic flux that is increasing stronger, then you will have the induced magnetic flux that is to oppose the stronger external magnetic field. so when external magnetic flux is going out of the page, then the induced magnetic flux must be going into the page (opposite) then apply right hand rule to find out the current direction. easy peasy.


(ii) and (iii) are also using the same principle.
